column2: Crocs Kids Unisex Basic Clog Khaki Floater
column20:
• Product Description
  • Product Details

  • Originally designed for boaters and fishermen to have a firm foot even on slippery surfaces
column21: crocs has gone a  long way in creating footwear for those who demand comfort to the T. Replete with several benefits such as the shoe moulding to your feet with just the body warmth
column22: it's a hot favourite among most people. The midsole band found in all of crocs footwear is a tribute to the classic vulcanized style of yesteryear footwear. Incredibly easy to clean
column23:
Crocs makes for a great footwear when working in the garden or in wet and messy conditions.

The speciality of these shoes are that they need to Fit loosely around the feet
column24: such that neither the sides of the shoe nor the toe unit come in contact with the feet. Instead
column25: there should be a quarter to half inch gap between the foot and the wall of the shoe
column26:
and you should be able to comfortably fit a finger between the heel and back strap.

Upper

  • EVA upper with textured inside for lightweight feel
column27:
comfort and durability
  • EVA material that moulds to the foot shape offering ample ergonomic comfort
  • Perforations on the forefoot and sides for ventilation and to drain away water
  • Back strap to support the ankle and hold the foot in place
  • Upper moulded to midsole for comfort and protection of feet from abrasion
  • Broad EVA lining along the midsole for enhanced durability
  • Branding button on upper for style

    • Midsole

    • EVA footbed with horizontal and foot shape lines for ergonomic comfort and acupressure
    • Crocs branding on mid heel for comfort and style
    • Fungus
column28:
bacteria and odour resistant for a healthy wear even in wet conditions
  • Mild heel cup on the footbed to support the heel

    • Outsole

    • Slip resistant outsole
    • Multi-directional textured leaf-shaped grooves in the forefoot and backfoot for ample grip
column29:
stability and comfort

Shoe care
Rub surface with clean
column30:
damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
